Prospective Students

Who we are looking for


Experience and interest

Prospective students will ideally have experience with quantitative analysis and an interest in fisheries management.

What you need to apply

See the SFU MRM website for information on how to apply to the program.
https://www.sfu.ca/rem/prospective-students/graduate-students/applying-to-rem.html
You must get accepted to into the program through REM. Applications are accepted based on grades and experience.
If you are interested in working in our lab please get in contact!
